last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Woo-joo and Dong-jin prepare to say goodbye. Will they send each other off smiling?

name: Call It Love
overview: A woman vows revenge on her for, a heart-wrenchingly lonely and gentle man.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Woojoo's family is suddenly forced to move after the news of her estranged father's death. Woojoo becomes homeless overnight and decides on revenge for all the injustices she has been put through. However, her supposed foe, Dongjin, is a heart-wrenchingly lonely and gentle soul. Will she be able to see her revenge plan through?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: With the sudden news of her father's death, Woo-joo is forced out of her home.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Best Fairs's business secrets are leaked and Woo-joo is blamed as the culprit.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Woo-joo receives an unexpected offer, and CEO Shin plans to destroy Best Fair.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Best Fair's project is put on hold, and Woo-joo has a secret rendezvous.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Woo-joo wavers as Dong-jin falls apart. Things proceed according to CEO Shin's plans.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Best Fair is driven to the brink. Amidst the chaos, Woo-joo and Dong-jin are contacted separately.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ji-gu is one step closer to finding out Dong-jin's identity, and Woo-joo fixes her mistakes.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Woo-joo asks Dong-jin for a favor. Someone begins to question Woo-joo's identity.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: CEO Shin tries to win over Woo-joo, but Woo-joo and Dong-jin work as a team.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Jun's concerns deepen, and Dong-jin musters up the courage to face Woo-joo.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Woo-joo tells Hyun-ju what she has been up to, and someone reveals those secrets to Sun-woo.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: An unwelcome guest visits Dong-jin's house. A suspicious man approaches Hyun-ju with information.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Woo-joo's family finds out Dong-jin's secret. Dong-jin notices a change in Sun-woo's attitude.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Woo-joo prepares to leave and Dong-jin tries to right wrongs, when they both hear shocking news.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Hyun-ju and Hee-ja meet again in the same place for the first time in thirteen years.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Woo-joo and Dong-jin prepare to say goodbye. Will they send each other off smiling?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Woojoo's family is suddenly forced to move after the news of her estranged father's death. Woojoo becomes homeless overnight and decides on revenge for all the injustices she has been put through. However, her supposed foe, Dongjin, is a heart-wrenchingly lonely and gentle soul. Will she be able to see her revenge plan through?
